passages.text:
Interactivity Examples:

CLICK:
I'm a #button. Click it to interact.

DRAG & DROP:
Drag it to a blank space to make sense.
I have a glass of #>water. I can see my plant is dying. Maybe I should #<water it.

LINK:
Drag one to link it to another to create a new outcome.
The door is strong. I need something powerful to brust it open. A box of #^matches is in my pocket. A #^dynamite sits near my feet.

TYPE:
Complete the word with missing characters.
"A tropical fruit that is yellow? With a pit?" What else can it be? A #:mango ?

#Back
